description:
Out of all the guys on our trip, I think Isaac had the most fun.
He was like a wide-eyed kid in a candy store. Beautiful weather, beautiful scenery, beautiful men, and lots and lots of sex.
He was one of a couple of guys who fully identified as being gay, so he was able to just be himself and sit back and watch the festivities!
Jake is still saying that he's straight, but he sure seems to be enjoying the man sex.
After we were done filming Isaac and Jake fucking each other flip-flop style, I asked Isaac what he liked best.
"I loved giving him head," he said. "He has such a nice cock and the foreskin felt great my mouth."
What did Jake like best?
"Getting off," he said. "I always love that!"
title: Hawaii - Isaac and Jake
